resources.string: Message Counter displays messages inbox statistics and number of messages from each of your contacts. This project\'s source code is available at GitHub.
Disclaimer: This app is created for educational purposes and as such has no guarantee or support. Since undocumented Android APIs are used, this app may not work as expected on all devices.

Others text includes messages from numbers that are not saved in your contacts, like mobile networks or financial institutions.
